title: ТикТок Талант
overview: The world's first TikTok talent show, from song and dance to painting and poetry reading. The participants passed the all-Russian casting, and the best of them will perform on the big stage in front of the jury - Larisa Guzeeva, Dima Bilan and star tiktokers. The winner of the show will receive the title of the main talent of the country and 1,000,000 rubles, and the audience will choose it by voting.
